column26: the daughter of william denton williams and lilly ruth wilson williams. mabel was a housewife
column27: homemaker and farmer. after raising her children
column28: she worked as a cna at several nursing homes in the area. she was a longtime member of charity baptist church in greensboro and attended faithfully as long as her health permitted. in addition to her parents
column29: mabel was preceded in death by her husband of 49 years
